meanings.definition: A large vehicle for transporting goods by road.
meanings.sent1: The lorry carried boxes of fruits to the market.
meanings.sent2: The delivery company uses a lorry to transport packages.
meanings.sent3: The lorry driver honked loudly to get the attention of the pedestrians.
meanings.sent4: The lorry rumbled down the street like a giant metal beast.
meanings.sent5: The shiny red lorry stood out among the other vehicles on the highway.

meanings.sent1: They lorry goods from the warehouse to the store every day.
meanings.sent2: We need to lorry the equipment to the construction site.
meanings.sent3: He decided to lorry the furniture instead of hiring a moving company.
meanings.sent4: She will lorry the supplies to the event in her own vehicle.
meanings.sent5: The company will lorry the products to different locations for distribution.
